column4: hi, I have a problem with Totem.  Often, I will be playing an mp3, a video or even something off of the web and suddenly, my entire computer freezes, requiring a hard restart.  Any ideas?  I am running Hardy w/ compiz enabled.
barslol: it's what I use, although it is a command line tool
barslol: also, avidemux is great for any transcode job, although sometimes it can desync the audio
barslol: ya, my bad, it was the first thing to come to my mind

hi, I have a problem with Totem.  Often, I will be playing an mp3, a video or even something off of the web and suddenly, my entire computer freezes, requiring a hard restart.  Any ideas?  I am running Hardy w/ compiz enabled.
can anyone help me with my totem problem?
it's a complete system crash scenario, out of the box
My problem is that sometimes (I can't determine the cause) totem will completely freeze my entire system
I've found one site that has proven to reproduce the affect
would you like the link?  Dunno if it'll cause the same problem on your comp
I can view the movie on that page without any problem
when the page loads the movie doesn't run until I click on it
